requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Catalina
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Big Sur
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card with 1024 MB MB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Make sure your video drivers are up-to-date!
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2+ Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card with 2048 MB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Make sure your video drivers are up-to-date!

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.4, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
